programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the opening fixtures of the season, including Middlesbrough v Millwall at Riverside Stadium, Blackburn Rovers v West Bromwich Albion at Ewood Park, and Norwich City v Hull City at Carrow Road in the Championship

programme.title: Tipping Point: Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Ben Shephard asks the questions as Jonathan Ross, Katie Piper and Antony Cotton answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the better their chances of collecting the £20,000 prize for their selected charity

programme.title: Romeo & Duet
programme.desc: Oti Mabuse presents the dating show that uses the power of singing to help people find their ideal partners, with Fia, Andrew, Vicky and Sheena-Rae taking part this time. Each of the singletons will be serenaded by up to four singers and if they like what they hear they make their way to the bottom of the stairs to choose their favourite, opening the door and locking in their choice before the performance comes to an end. Each of the four new couples then compete to be crowned the winners by the studio audience and bag themselves a second date

programme.title: Paul Sinha's TV Showdown
programme.desc: Chaser, stand-up comedian and TV trivia genius Paul Sinha hosts this TV-themed comedy quiz show. Team captains Fay Ripley and Rob Beckett are joined by celebrity guests Josie d'Arby, Emilia Fox, Richard Madeley and John Thomson to compete head-to-head and test their TV knowledge

programme.title: Code Blue: Murder
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary revealing how detectives solved two murders - from the first 'Code Blue' call to the crime scene, through to the convictions of the killers. In the first part, a 999 call from a distraught daughter launches a murder investigation to find the brutal killer of a beloved grandmother, June Fox-Roberts. With access to the South Wales Police's Major Crimes Unit, detectives try to identify the killer through CCTV footage in the hours before and after June's death

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Fishing Allstars
programme.desc: Dean Macey and Adam Rooney travel to Dorset with England international angler Matt Godfrey, where they target a 20lb carp on an overnight challenge, before trying their hand at sea fishing for wrasse at Portland Bill, and finally trying to catch a 5lb chub at Throop Fishery

programme.title: Dare Master
programme.desc: Danny goes extreme window cleaning, but will he be brave enough to abseil down the building and avoid the forfeit?

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd gets his head wedged between the two panes of a double-glazed window while trying to get a trapped raisin - as the sun comes out, Abacus and PB realise that only Berry is small enough to rescue him, but Lloyd would rather bake than be rescued by Berry...

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. PB sets Lloyd up in a fight with Dotty the ladybird's brother Freckles - worried that he'll defeat a little ladybird with ease, Lloyd makes himself as weak and unfit as possible to make the fight fairer, but Freckles is not the weak opponent he expected...

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Elmer visits Daffy for a quick shoe shine. / Wile E. Coyote clones himself to catch the Road Runner. / Porky is running late for movie night, but finding an available parking spot turns out to be more difficult than he imagined

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Bugs races against Cecil the Turtle for the title of 'fastest thing in New York City.' / The only thing more painful than Porky's sore tooth is a visit to dentist Daffy

programme.title: Mystery Lane
programme.desc: Animated series about a young guinea pig and her little brother, who look to solve police investigations. A prestigious diamond on display at the British Museum has just been stolen and the theft bears the signature of Warragul, the infamous diamond gnome. The problem is that the criminal in question is still imprisoned in the high-security section of Greenside.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam is chosen to compete in an important general knowledge quiz. But someone steals JC's fly swatter while she's revising in the library. JC, along with Amber as his super-detective, prevent all students present from leaving the library until the culprit is unmasked. To help Sam get away, Mo asks the Scepter for the power of polymorphism. But the half-power is erratic... and only the head changes!

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Disaster! Mo is unwittingly recorded on the school's surveillance camera while using a power. Fortunately for our duo, Mo isn't recognisable on the video. But Brick is feverish, he's utterly determined to find out who's behind this 'supernatural being'. Mo and Sam manage to keep their identity secret, but HORRORS! JC announces he is the superhero on camera! He declares his 'superhero' name is 'Swatteroo The Sublime' and that he's gifted with astonishing super powers.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Monsters and ghouls get in the way of the Scooby gang's adventures as they travel and spend time together in the summer

programme.title: Katie Piper's Breakfast Show
programme.desc: The model and Loose Women panellist is joined by comedian and actor Joe Thomas, while there is advice from experts and tips for entertainment in the week ahead

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: FIFA Women's World Cup 2023
programme.desc: Sweden v USA (Kick-off 10.00am). Coverage of the fourth-last 16 match, held at Melbourne Rectangular Stadium in Australia. Sweden finished third four years ago and were in excellent form in Group G, winning their matches against South Africa, Italy and Argentina. The Americans are the holders, but they have failed to play their best football so far, finishing second in Group E after a win against Vietnam and draws with Netherlands and Portugal

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes
programme.desc: Jason shares his love of fresh produce with a trip to a supersized vegetable market, then makes a tomato tartare with black olive tapenade, and a pudding made with beetroot and carrot. . He is joined by chef Mohamed Orfali, who visits a farm just outside Dubai that grows vegetables in desert sand

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh heads to Swindon to surprise Lorraine, a retired RAF servicewoman and devoted charity volunteer. Because of a spinal injury, Lorraine struggles with mobility issues and lives with her full-time support team - Leonbergers Poppy and Doris. Poppy is a retired therapy dog and Doris is Lorraine's assistance dog, and helps with chores such as laundry and fetching household items. The team creates a fabulous low-maintenance garden as a calming retreat for both Lorraine and her canine family

programme.title: DNA Journey
programme.desc: TV presenters Kate Garraway and Alison Hammond embark on a road trip to find out about their family history using a mix of DNA and genealogy, and by meeting living family members they never knew existed. Kate is excited as she is heading to London to meet her cousins for the first time. For Alison, visiting Jamaica - the homeland of her recently deceased mum, is an incredibly emotional and moving journey, one that brings her closer to her mum as she finds out the most jaw-dropping of maternal histories

programme.title: FA Community Shield Live
programme.desc: Manchester City v Arsenal (Kick-off 4.00pm). Mark Pougatch is joined by Roy Keane and Emma Hayes to present coverage of the traditional curtain-raiser to the top-flight campaign, held at Wembley Stadium. The Citizens won a Premier League, FA Cup and UEFA Champions League treble last term, but have lost in this match in each of the previous two campaigns, to Leicester City and then Liverpool. Arsenal, who finished second in the Premier last term, last appeared in this competition in 2019, when they defeated Liverpool on penalties. With commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon, and reports from Gabriel Clarke

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: Headlines affecting the local area

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lizzy Swann is found dead at the bottom of a cliffside coastal walkway, but what appears at first to be a terrible accident, quickly becomes a murder investigation as Vera discovers evidence the body has been tampered with. Interviews with those who knew Lizzy paint a troubling picture of a guarded and paranoid woman who seemed to be burning bridges with friends and family alike in the days leading up to her death

programme.title: A Spy Among Friends
programme.desc: Elliott and Lily now have to assume that no one can be trusted and must get to Blunt before anyone else to interrogate him and confirm their suspicions about Sir Roger Hollis. Angleton hears of the death of his two agents in Moscow and realises he's been played by Philby, so he arranges for the apprehension and rendition of Blunt to a CIA safe house

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell follows the stories of two women looking for siblings given up for adoption, but for very different reasons. Jeanette Woodyatt wants to find the brother she has never met and who was turned away from the family by her grandmother, while Karen Turnbull yearns to let her twin siblings know that their mother gave them up for adoption so they would have a better life

programme.title: Kate Garraway's Life Stories
programme.desc: Kate Garraway is joined by entertainer, author and Strictly Come Dancing star Anton Du Beke. From his struggles growing up on a council estate in Kent to winning a National Television Award for best TV judge, Kate delves into Du Beke's remarkable rise from a provincial dance school to one of the biggest shows on British television. But behind the showbiz sparkle, we'll hear how Anton went through many years of struggle, some of which he speaks about for the very first time

programme.title: Romeo & Duet
programme.desc: Oti Mabuse presents the dating show that uses the power of singing to help people find their ideal partners, with Owen, Charlotte, Amba-Jae and Adazae taking part this time. programme.title: The Masked Singer

programme.title: Paul Sinha's TV Showdown

programme.title: Ainsley's Mediterranean Cookbook
programme.desc: Ainsley's adventure brings him to North Africa and the Moroccan city of Marrakesh, where he attends a pottery lesson to learn how to make authentic tagine pots, and makes a dish that is a true celebration of Morocco, a sweet potato and butternut squash tagine. Later, he hits the main square in Marrakesh for some street food, before heading to the kitchen to prepare harissa and preserved lemon chicken skewers

programme.title: Ainsley's Mediterranean Cookbook
programme.desc: The presenter makes his way to Seville in southern Spain, where he visits the San Leandro convent, where nuns have been selling homemade sweets to visitors for 400 years. Then, he finds the perfect spot for his cookbook kitchen, where he whips up a charred orange and spiced almond salad. Later, Ainsley learns about all things Iberico ham from deli owner Elio, before heading back to his pop up kitchen to whip up a sandwich

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Quiz hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts, but are all about logic and common sense. A hundred contestants begin every show, but who will make it to the end and answer a question only one per cent of the country can get right - and win up to £100,000?

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.desc: Stephen Fry looks at autumn in the northern hemisphere and spring in the south, seasons of change that bring opportunities, but also huge challenges. By September temperatures in northern Canada can plummet as low as -20C, but there is one stretch of river that still flows and bears are able to fish for the final salmon of the season. In southern Africa the rains have been gone for many months and watering holes have all-but dried up, while a king penguin chick on Marion Island answers the call of the ocean

programme.title: Karen Carney's Leaders of the Pack
programme.desc: Karen meets the five-time African Women's Footballer of the Year Asisat Oshoala, who has given girls the chance to chase their dreams through her foundation in Lagos, Nigeria

programme.title: Paul Sinha's TV Showdown

programme.title: Code Blue: Murder
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary revealing how detectives solved two murders - from the first 'Code Blue' call to the crime scene, through to the convictions of the killers. In the first part, a 999 call from a distraught daughter launches a murder investigation to find the brutal killer of a beloved grandmother, June Fox-Roberts. With access to the South Wales Police's Major Crimes Unit, detectives try to identify the killer through CCTV footage in the hours before and after June's death

programme.title: Dare Master
programme.desc: Danny goes extreme window cleaning, but will he be brave enough to abseil down the building and avoid the forfeit?

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. programme.title: Mystery Lane
programme.desc: Animated series about a young guinea pig and her little brother, who look to solve police investigations. A prestigious diamond on display at the British Museum has just been stolen and the theft bears the signature of Warragul, the infamous diamond gnome. The problem is that the criminal in question is still imprisoned in the high-security section of Greenside.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam is chosen to compete in an important general knowledge quiz. But someone steals JC's fly swatter while she's revising in the library. JC, along with Amber as his super-detective, prevent all students present from leaving the library until the culprit is unmasked. To help Sam get away, Mo asks the Scepter for the power of polymorphism. But the half-power is erratic... and only the head changes!

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Disaster! Mo is unwittingly recorded on the school's surveillance camera while using a power. Fortunately for our duo, Mo isn't recognisable on the video. But Brick is feverish, he's utterly determined to find out who's behind this 'supernatural being'. Mo and Sam manage to keep their identity secret, but HORRORS! JC announces he is the superhero on camera! He declares his 'superhero' name is 'Swatteroo The Sublime' and that he's gifted with astonishing super powers.

programme.title: FIFA Women's World Cup 2023
programme.desc: Sweden v USA (Kick-off 10.00am). Coverage of the fourth-last 16 match, held at Melbourne Rectangular Stadium in Australia. Sweden finished third four years ago and were in excellent form in Group G, winning their matches against South Africa, Italy and Argentina. The Americans are the holders, but they have failed to play their best football so far, finishing second in Group E after a win against Vietnam and draws with Netherlands and Portugal

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes
programme.desc: Jason shares his love of fresh produce with a trip to a supersized vegetable market, then makes a tomato tartare with black olive tapenade, and a pudding made with beetroot and carrot. . He is joined by chef Mohamed Orfali, who visits a farm just outside Dubai that grows vegetables in desert sand

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh heads to Swindon to surprise Lorraine, a retired RAF servicewoman and devoted charity volunteer. Because of a spinal injury, Lorraine struggles with mobility issues and lives with her full-time support team - Leonbergers Poppy and Doris. Poppy is a retired therapy dog and Doris is Lorraine's assistance dog, and helps with chores such as laundry and fetching household items. The team creates a fabulous low-maintenance garden as a calming retreat for both Lorraine and her canine family

programme.title: DNA Journey
programme.desc: TV presenters Kate Garraway and Alison Hammond embark on a road trip to find out about their family history using a mix of DNA and genealogy, and by meeting living family members they never knew existed. Kate is excited as she is heading to London to meet her cousins for the first time. For Alison, visiting Jamaica - the homeland of her recently deceased mum, is an incredibly emotional and moving journey, one that brings her closer to her mum as she finds out the most jaw-dropping of maternal histories

programme.title: FA Community Shield Live
programme.desc: Manchester City v Arsenal (Kick-off 4.00pm). Mark Pougatch is joined by Roy Keane and Emma Hayes to present coverage of the traditional curtain-raiser to the top-flight campaign, held at Wembley Stadium. The Citizens won a Premier League, FA Cup and UEFA Champions League treble last term, but have lost in this match in each of the previous two campaigns, to Leicester City and then Liverpool. Arsenal, who finished second in the Premier last term, last appeared in this competition in 2019, when they defeated Liverpool on penalties. With commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon, and reports from Gabriel Clarke

programme.title: Vera

Interviews with those who knew Lizzy paint a troubling picture of a guarded and paranoid woman who seemed to be burning bridges with friends and family alike in the days leading up to her death

programme.desc: Kate Garraway is joined by entertainer, author and Strictly Come Dancing star Anton Du Beke. From his struggles growing up on a council estate in Kent to winning a National Television Award for best TV judge, Kate delves into Du Beke's remarkable rise from a provincial dance school to one of the biggest shows on British television. But behind the showbiz sparkle, we'll hear how Anton went through many years of struggle, some of which he speaks about for the very first time

They relieve the most dramatic moments from the Villa and answer all the big questions. Is love still on the cards? What happened when the cameras stopped rolling? And who's been secretly hooking up?

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter receives tickets to a boxing match as a birthday gift, and ends up volunteering Lois to compete. To everyone's surprise, she proves to be a natural pugilist, prompting her hapless husband to become her fight promoter - little suspecting that she is using her marital frustrations as motivation in the ring

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian learns Rush Limbaugh has arranged a book signing at the Quahog Mall, and decides to attend the event to give the outspoken radio talk-show host a piece of his mind. However, when Rush unexpectedly comes to his rescue, the liberal-thinking dog has a political change of heart

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Hayley tries to fit in with a popular group of former high-school friends and, in the process, discovers that Steve has a talent for forging IDs. She uses him to start a business, but they soon come up against another fake ID kingpin - Roger

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve and Snot use a cloning machine to produce two women who will agree to date them, having been thwarted in their attempts to pair up with a couple of girls for the upcoming high-school prom. Meanwhile, there are disastrous consequences when Stan takes home the CIA's cloned pet, Daren the Dodo

programme.title: All American
programme.desc: Billy settles into his new role and finds inspiration from an unlikely source, while JJ introduces Asher to his coach in the hope that he can get a student job with the team

programme.title: Iain Stirling's CelebAbility
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffat leads a group of three friends looking to win a slew of prizes by defeating Alex George, Maisie Smith, the Vivienne and Dane Baptiste in a series of silly games

programme.title: Plebs
programme.desc: Comedy following three desperate young men from the suburbs as they pursue romance, try to hold down jobs and climb the social ladder in Ancient Rome. Things take an upward turn for Marcus, Stylax and Grumio when they meet two attractive British girls in the courtyard and stumble upon a flyer for an orgy. Starring Tom Rosenthal, Joel Fry and Ryan Sampson

programme.title: Plebs
programme.desc: Cynthia's charming new gladiator boyfriend Cassius impresses everyone except a jealous Marcus, who makes it clear that he wants the relationship to fail as soon as possible. Meanwhile, Stylax plays a prank on Aurelius that ends up going a little too far. Comedy, guest starring Danny Dyer, with Tom Rosenthal, Joel Fry and Ryan Sampson

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: The Kings offer to take Zoe's redundant fleet of refuse trucks off her hands, while Scott makes his feelings perfectly plain, and Marlon seems to have lost his touch in the kitchen

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Scott offers Dawn a job, prompting an almighty row with Terry, and Jack's solution to Andy's problems does not go down well with Katie

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: David's actions cause Vera to have a serious think about the way she has been treating Gail, and Jason's exciting news goes down like a lead balloon

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Audrey offers to pay off Gail's mortgage, while Jack and Vera win a dream house

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon and Oliver make plans to visit their children in Canada, purchasing their cut-price air tickets from a dubious source. However, Simon forgets his passport and inadvertently sets of his burglar alarm while trying to retrieve it. Comedy, with Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon and Oliver endanger a lot more than their hearts when they both take a fancy to an attractive shop assistant. Comedy, starring Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: As the staff come to terms with the recent tragic events, new ambulance driver Bobby makes a dramatic entrance. Marian finds herself a partner for the gig by Alun's band - but the evening ends in chaos when a fire breaks out at the overcrowded club. Up on the moors, a shooting incident leaves Ormerod and Bobby in danger and the mountain rescue team is called out to an elderly lady lying wounded outside her decaying farmhouse. Guest starring former Coronation Street star Sean Wilson

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Dr Burnett is called out to a dilapidated farmhouse, where a teenager is running a high fever and his family seems to be struggling to cope. As the staff try to diagnose the youngster's illness, his pregnant mother is rushed to the hospital with the same symptoms and is left fighting for her life. Meanwhile, Ormerod and Rose attend to Sir Edward Fawcett, an eccentric explorer who wants to hike around Mexico, despite having a condition that means his days of adventure are over. Medical drama, guest starring Brian Blessed and Phyllis Logan

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The residents of Aidensfield are terrorised by a blackmailer and Sergeant Merton is less than impressed by the investigative methods of the handsome newcomer PC Rob Walker. Meanwhile, Vernon embarks on a venture in the prestigious world of publishing, with the help of David and Bernie. Jonathan Kerrigan stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An audacious thief steals the Aidensfield force's panda car and carries out a series of brazen robberies disguised as a police officer, culminating in a serious break-in at a jeweller's shop. Meanwhile, Vernon persuades Lord Ashfordly to host an exclusive painting weekend and offers his expertise to the amateur artists

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Scott sweet-talks Dawn during her first day at work, Chastity wangles a job at the cafe and Katie tries to rid herself of Robert's unsettling presence

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Terry tries to look after TJ. Dawn finds it tough being a working mum and is all too ready to take up Scott's offer of a much-needed drink at the end of the day

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Audrey goes into debt to pay off Gail's mortgage, the Grimshaws are left holding the baby and Karen makes a public display of taking her wedding ring off in the Rovers

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Gail adopts a calmer approach to try to get Sarah back on side, and Jason reacts angrily to Eileen's double standards

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: An armed robbery ends in murder and Frost wastes no time in arresting a known crook he saw at the scene during the getaway, convinced he is one of the men responsible. With this little mystery to solve, as well as a case of four burglaries in as many days at the same house, the dogged policeman's lot proves a busy one indeed. David Jason stars, with Billy Murray and James Hayes

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Oscar finds himself in an awkward position when the police investigate a warehouse robbery. A lost property clear-out at the police station gives David a new hobby, but he soon manages to cause trouble. Starring Derek Fowlds and David Lonsdale

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Merton investigates a suspicious death with the help of CID and Walker begins to suspect a poacher may be involved. Vernon tempts fate by employing a new mechanic for the garage without asking Bernie and attempts to recreate a traditional dance at the town fete. Guest starring Hannah Gordon

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa and Martin search for a nursery now that Janice has left, and Mrs Tishell is shocked to find out that Al has very high blood pressure. Louisa also helps with the diagnosis of a pupil, which spurs her on to explore the possibilities of a change of career. This is not welcome news for Martin, who dislikes any kind of change, even if it could be for the better. Elsewhere, Ruth is approached about selling her farm. Starring Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Selina Cadell and Ian McNeice

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The curmudgeonly GP is perturbed when he discovers Louisa, who is already spending much of her time away from home, has applied to take up a child and adolescent counselling course. However, achieving a work-life balance is far from the greatest of concerns for some of the Ellinghams' neighbours, not least of whom is Al, whose plans to demonstrate his business acumen are placed in jeopardy when Ken decides to close the pub. Unless Ruth agrees to serve as a guarantor, Ken will not allow Morwenna and Al to take over the establishment, so the pair arrange a race-walking event to raise funds and prove the community is on their side

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The murder of a caretaker has been so carefully planned and executed that the police are left without a single piece of evidence. Adding to the mystery is the fact that the crime is laid out in detail in a manual purchased three weeks earlier in the victim's name. Brooks and Casey eventually track down the killer, who confesses, but the trial is put in jeopardy by a canny defence lawyer. Guest starring Toby Stephens

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie returns as the sleuthing spinster in the first of three murder mysteries. While staying at a hotel in the Caribbean, Miss Marple investigates the death of a fellow guest, refusing to believe he died of a heart attack. With the help of a business tycoon she sets about finding the real cause of the man's demise, and is soon drawn into a web of deceit and dark magic. Adapted by Charlie Higson and co-starring Antony Sher, Robert Webb, Montserrat Lombard, Daniel Rigby, Hermione Norris, MyAnna Buring, Warren Brown and Oliver Ford Davies

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon and Oliver forge an uneasy pact when they learn that Lyn is pregnant, but tensions arise when they are interviewed on a local radio station

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon and Oliver return to a bachelor existence, now that their children have finally flown the coop. Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies star

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: While Simon delves into genealogy, Oliver prepares to add to his customers none other than HRH The Prince of Wales. Comedy, starring Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Gruff detective Jack Frost's plans for a quiet weekend are disrupted by the gruesome discovery of an unidentified body floating in the river. However, soon after he has begun the investigation, he is forced to apply his deductive skills to a separate case involving an act of violence during a football match which left a player in a coma. Crime drama, starring David Jason, Larry Lamb, Bruce Alexander, Lindy Whiteford and Berwick Kaler

programme.title: Carry On Matron (1972)
programme.desc: A wily thief gathers a band of crooks for a plot to break into a maternity hospital and steal the supply of contraceptive pills. One of the gang gets the lie of the land by disguising himself as a nurse, but the hypochondriac head doctor and formidable matron prove constant obstacles to the heist. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams and Hattie Jacques

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary are hired to create a restaurant garden on Italy's Ligurian coast, but it is not long before their working holiday is disrupted by a murder. Determined to solve the crime before returning home, they find themselves with no shortage of suspects - and matters are complicated further by a second death. Guest starring Suzanne Bertish (Rome) and Tristan Gemmill (Casualty), with Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: An archaeologist posing as Rosemary dies mysteriously during a dig for Anglo-Saxon artefacts in the grounds of Lord Engleton's stately home, presenting the duo with a fresh mystery to solve. The gardens are unaccountably blighted by yellowing, forcing the estate to close its gates to the public, and a second death suggests somebody will go to any lengths for a piece of British history. Guest starring Julian Wadham

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: The apparent accidental death of a drug addict takes a surprising turn when the results of the post-mortem examination are revealed, and Jack finds himself confronting his own chequered past. Ewen Bremner guest-stars, with David Jason

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: The detective is approached by a former mentor from his college days, who asks Morse to ensure the safety of his wife. However, the assignment leaves him contemplating his future with the police force. Meanwhile, a murder in the world of fashion stirs up old gangland conflicts in the city. Detective drama series, starring Shaun Evans as the young Inspector Morse

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is discovered bound to a tree, doused in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads DCI Barnaby to tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron at the upmarket Wyvern House restaurant. However, secrets from the past surface after the murderer strikes again, and the repercussions are felt further than they were originally intended. With Neil Dudgeon, Neil McCaul, Sharon Small, Marc Elliott and Arabella Weir

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Nelson discover that the exciting world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets after the owner of Finchmere Airfield is hit on the head and dropped to his death from a plane. Are anti-aircraft campaigners behind Bernard King's murder, or is the incident linked to a tragic Second World War mission? Neil Dudgeon and Gwilym Lee are joined by guest stars including June Whitfield, Robert Bathurst, Bernard Cribbins and Laila Rouass

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of Midsomer resident and biscuit factory boss Eric Calder leads Barnaby and Nelson to Copenhagen. The pair join forces with local detectives Birgitte Poulsen and Anna Degn in the hunt for the killer, and during the course of their investigation they discover the businessman had numerous links to the capital. Anglo-Danish collaboration originally shown to mark Midsomer's 100th episode, guest starring Ann Eleonora Jorgensen (The Killing), Birgitte Hjort Sorensen (Borgen), Sanjeev Bhaskar and Joanna Scanlan, alongside Neil Dudgeon and Gwilym Lee

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The detective interrogates a mysterious Dane who has been caught with the dead body of a diamond dealer in his car, and who proves entirely resistant to his questioning. Maigret is convinced his suspect's sister may know something, but soon discovers that everyone in the small rural town where they live is hiding something

programme.title: Scott & Bailey
programme.desc: Rachel has a lucky escape while walking home when she narrowly avoids being hit by a car. Shaken, she starts pursuing the driver, who has fled on foot, and the next day she suspects the incident was an attempted murder - and that Nick may be involved. As she tries to deal with the revelation, Janet is left to take charge of the latest case - the gang shooting of a teenager whose friend is a key witness. Detective drama, starring Lesley Sharp and Suranne Jones

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Caroline asks the feuding pair to supply the entertainment for her charity luncheon, but soon regrets her decision. Comedy, starring Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Jack tackles what promises to be the most sensitive and unenviable investigation of his entire career - deciding whether a man with Down's syndrome is capable of committing murder. David Jason stars as the caustic copper, with Bruce Alexander and Matthew Marsh

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: A confrontation between hunt stewards and saboteurs leads to the suspicious death of a protester - and makes Jack wonder whether the thrill of the chase has given the horsey set a taste for human blood. Whodunit, starring David Jason as DI Frost, with Bruce Alexander, Sean Pertwee, Del Henney and Tat Whalley

programme.title: Carry On Abroad (1972)
programme.desc: British holiday-makers jet off on a package holiday to the Spanish resort of Elsbels. Unluckily, not only is the hotel short of staff, but it also has no walls, ceilings or entertainment. Further mishaps leave the tourists fuming - until they sample a local punch laced with an aphrodisiac. Comedy, with Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey and Joan Sims

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa and Martin search for a nursery now that Janice has left, and Mrs Tishell is shocked to find out that Al has very high blood pressure. Louisa also helps with the diagnosis of a pupil, which spurs her on to explore the possibilities of a change of career. This is not welcome news for Martin, who dislikes any kind of change, even if it could be for the better. Elsewhere, Ruth is approached about selling her farm. Starring Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Selina Cadell and Ian McNeice

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The sleuth helps an old friend find refuge at country house Greenshaw's Folly, but a sinister shadow falls over the strange building's various inhabitants and a murderer strikes. Miss Marple uncovers secrets from the past about Miss Greenshaw as a dangerous storm gathers and the bodies start to pile up. Julia McKenzie heads an all-star cast that includes Jim Moir (better known as Vic Reeves), Kimberley Nixon, Fiona Shaw, Robert Glenister, Julia Sawalha, Judy Parfitt and Matt Willis (formerly of pop group Busted)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Newlyweds Mike and Ellie decide to build their dream home at a beauty spot called Gypsy's Acre, ignoring the warnings of elusive romany Mrs Lee about an ancient curse supposedly cast upon the land. The couple settle into their new life, but the mysterious woman makes her presence felt, subjecting them to a campaign of hatred in an attempt to force them out. Tragedy soon strikes, but as luck would have it Miss Marple is staying nearby with her recently widowed old friend Mrs Phillpot. However, if the spinster sleuth is to solve the puzzle, she must put her own life in grave danger. Murder mystery, starring Julia McKenzie, with Wendy Craig, Glynis Barber, Hugh Dennis, Tamzin Outhwaite, Tom Hughes, Joanna Vanderham, Aneurin Barnard, William Hope and Janet Henfrey

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Laura and Rosemary are called in to investigate when gardens entered for a village contest are attacked by a disease. Further sinister undercurrents are exposed when reigning champion Donald Westward is found dead and recriminations start to fly as buried rivalries come to the surface. Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris star

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The amateur sleuths are called to a monastery to restore a herb garden in time for a royal visit - but their pruning and planting is disrupted by the discovery of a corpse. As they investigate the death, the tight-knit community closes in around them. Mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Judi Dench's Wild Borneo Adventure
programme.desc: Part one of two. The award-winning actress embarks on a trip of a lifetime to uncover the lush rainforests, magical wildlife and spectacular coastlines of Malaysian Borneo. Judi experiences the rainforest for the first time in a thrilling 100-mile helicopter ride to the heart of the island with expert Glen Reynolds, before observing orangutans in the wild and learning how they are helping to prevent global warming

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure
programme.desc: As her Silk Road journey continues, Joanna travels to the Islamic Republic of Iran, where she meets many people eager to share the culture and innovations of the Persian civilisation, which spread far beyond modern day Iran. From ancient water gardens created to be paradise on Earth, through desert cities, endless bazaars and majestic mosques, Joanna discovers a country brimming with hospitality and warmth. Her Iranian adventure finishes in the Persian Empire's ancient ceremonial capital, Persepolis

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: The leader of a censorship campaign comes to Oxford on a speaking tour, and Morse is charged with protecting her in light of a series of death threats. A bricklayer working on a controversial pop singer's house is later found dead, and when a second killing occurs, a connection emerges to the speaker's movement, plunging Morse into the middle of a conflict over the nature of British culture

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: James blames Richard's interference when his offer of marriage is rejected by Hazel, but a visit from his beloved's father reveals the truth of the situation

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: As the staff come to terms with the recent tragic events, new ambulance driver Bobby makes a dramatic entrance. Marian finds herself a partner for the gig by Alun's band - but the evening ends in chaos when a fire breaks out at the overcrowded club. Up on the moors, a shooting incident leaves Ormerod and Bobby in danger and the mountain rescue team is called out to an elderly lady lying wounded outside her decaying farmhouse. Guest starring former Coronation Street star Sean Wilson

programme.desc: Dr Burnett is called out to a dilapidated farmhouse, where a teenager is running a high fever and his family seems to be struggling to cope. As the staff try to diagnose the youngster's illness, his pregnant mother is rushed to the hospital with the same symptoms and is left fighting for her life. Meanwhile, Ormerod and Rose attend to Sir Edward Fawcett, an eccentric explorer who wants to hike around Mexico, despite having a condition that means his days of adventure are over. Medical drama, guest starring Brian Blessed and Phyllis Logan

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: The surly detective tries to get out of attending a reunion of George Cross holders because a serial rapist has struck again on his patch. Righteous indignation prompts him to take the most desperate professional gamble of his entire career by using PC Hazel Wallace as bait in a trap. He eventually picks up a lead involving the most recent victim's father, but comes under pressure from within the force to back down or be thrown off the case. David Jason stars

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon's love life hots up when an old flame reappears on the scene. Comedy, starring Donald Sinden and Windsor Davies

programme.title: World of Sport
programme.desc: Richard Henwood looks back at television sporting firsts, including footage of a 14-year-old Ronnie O'Sullivan who would go on to take snooker by storm

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur acquires an old police coach and launches a sight-seeing business. However, it is not long before the vehicle breaks down and his passengers are forced to seek refuge at the Winchester. Drama, starring George Cole and Gary Webster

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: Regan's holiday is disrupted by the escape of a violent psychopath from prison. Tim Cook, dubbed 'The Leopard' by the press has vowed murderous revenge on the detective inspector for his earlier capture, and has friends on the outside prepared to harbour him while he plans his attack. Crime drama, starring John Thaw and Dennis Waterman

programme.title: Giant Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: The William Norling is seven days into a nine-day run and Skipper Danny is no closer to finding a buyer for his 1,000kg of lobster. He's running up huge operating costs and desperately needs a sale to stay afloat.

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Robin is bewitched by evil sorceress Lilith, who sends him on a mission to steal the magical silver arrow from Herne's cave. Michael Praed stars

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: Part two of two. Thomas is shocked by the arrival of Diane's twin sister, while a hitch in Higgins' wedding plans is ironed out by a disappointed Agatha. Sharon Stone guest stars

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: A look at a married couple that have made a booming business out of their hand-made Scotch eggs, and how a cotton mill-turned-soap factory is producing traditional bars, according to a process passed down through the generations. Plus, the team of craftsmen making the most accurate compasses in the world, and a behind-the-scenes look at the family firm making teddy bears that are cherished by children around the world

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: The crusading heroes investigate a murder, which leads them to uncover ageing Nazis who are being held in a disused mine. Starring William Gaunt and Alexandra Bastedo

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Robin and the outlaws leave Sherwood to defend a distant village from a band of phantom horsemen known as the Hounds of Lucifer, who terrorise the countryside on the orders of a powerful coven ruled by Morgwyn of Ravenscar. Guest starring Rula Lenska

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: Thomas reluctantly agrees to help Higgins' friend Garwood Huddle, a retired bank robber who topped the police's most-wanted list back in the 1940s, find the crooks responsible for kidnapping his grandchild. Tom Selleck stars

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: A £30,000 consignment of mercury is stolen and the squad is bemused when the prime suspect comes up with a cast-iron alibi - he was in the company of his 'mistress' hours before his planned wedding ceremony. Diana Dors guest stars in the crime drama, alongside John Thaw and Dennis Waterman

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: When Ray's van breaks down, Arthur takes to the water using a barge to transport a cargo of dodgy video recorders. However, the fearsome Bible-quoting Welshman who owns them is on his tail. George Cole and Gary Webster star

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at the Scottish firm making cashmere for the world's finest fashion houses. Plus, a look at how a jigsaw puzzle is made, the family of fishermen producing Welsh delicacies of cockles and laver bread, and how a quintessentially British teapot is made

programme.title: World Series of Darts
programme.desc: A chance to see day one of the tournament from Globox Arena in Hamilton, New Zealand, featuring the first-round matches, which saw the eight seeded players take on eight of the best players from Australia and New Zealand for a place in the quarter-finals. Gerwyn Price is the defending champion, but was likely to face stiff competition from the on-form Michael Van Gerwen. Commentary comes from Stuart Pyke, Mark Webster, and Dan Dawson

programme.desc: Hard-hitting action from the world of All Elite Wrestling - the roster features world-class talent including Jon Moxley, Chris Jericho, Bryan Danielson and Claudio Castagnoli, and many more who bring a freshness and energy into professional wrestling

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur comes up with a plan to boost business at the Winchester Club by staging variety nights. The idea proves popular until the karaoke machine, rented from the fearsome Gabadini family, is stolen. George Cole stars

programme.desc: A frustrated housewife supplies Regan with the names of the gang who recently ransacked a bookmakers - including that of her husband, a notorious robber. However, he has a cast-iron alibi, so proving his guilt proves harder than anticipated. Crime drama, starring John Thaw and Dennis Waterman

programme.desc: Richard Henwood delves into the ITV Sport archives to take a look back at James Hunt, Barry Sheene and a spectacular crash by Kelvin Burt

programme.desc: Harry arrives at a harbour brewery to confront drug dealers who know the whereabouts of a huge stash of heroin. Drama, starring Robert Vaughn, Nyree Dawn Porter and Tony Anholt

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur acquires an old police coach and launches a sight-seeing business. However, it is not long before the vehicle breaks down and his passengers are forced to seek refuge at the Winchester. Drama, starring George Cole and Gary Webster

programme.title: British Touring Car Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Steve Rider presents action from the sixth meeting of the season, held at the Croft Circuit, where the 16th, 17th and 18th races of the season took place. With commentary by David Addison and Tim Harvey, and reports from Louise Goodman

programme.title: ITV Racing: The Opening Show
programme.desc: Rishi Persad presents from Goodwood ahead of the final day of the Glorious Goodwood Festival, which features the big betting handicap of the week - the Stewards' Cup

programme.title: The Big Match Revisited
programme.desc: Brian Moore presents this special FA Cup edition of the Big Match Revisited from January 1978, featuring a whopping 16 goals from three action-packed games as Liverpool travel to Stamford Bridge to face Chelsea, Everton host Aston Villa at Goodison Park and Sheffield United v Arsenal

programme.title: The Big Match Revisited
programme.desc: Dickie Davies presents action from January 1978, including Luton Town v Oldham Athletic, Ipswich Town v Manchester United and Newcastle United v Middlesbrough

programme.title: Sport Filler Shows (2020)
programme.desc: A look back at memorable stagings of the race from Epsom Downs. Featuring brilliant performances from Shergar to Sea the Stars, plus interviews with personalities from the worlds of sport and entertainment

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: A look at how the hovercraft inspired one of Britain's best-selling lawnmowers, and what goes into making a suitcase that's beloved by Royalty, explorers and Hollywood celebs. Plus, what it takes to craft a spoon fit for the Downing Street dinner table, and the British bangers made by a family run firm, turning the sausage status-quo on its head

programme.title: World Superbike Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the eighth round of the campaign, which came from Autodrom Most in the Czech Republic

programme.title: Rio Lobo (1970)
programme.desc: A former Union Army colonel heads for Texas to recover a shipment of gold bullion stolen from a payroll train during the American Civil War. Along the way, he searches for a pair of traitors he holds responsible for a defeat suffered by his unit, which led to the loss of a close friend. Howard Hawks' Western, starring John Wayne, Jorge Rivero, Christopher Mitchum, Jack Elam, Jennifer O'Neill and Mike Henry

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: Latest news from the world of entertainment.

Howard Hawks' Western, starring John Wayne, Jorge Rivero, Christopher Mitchum, Jack Elam, Jennifer O'Neill and Mike Henry

programme.title: World Series of Darts

All four of the seeded players progressed to this stage of last year's competition, but only Dimitri Van den Bergh and Michael Smith would reach the semi-finals, and both would see their participation end there. The final featured two Welsh players, with Gerwyn Price going on to defeat Jonny Clayton 8-4 and lift the trophy. Commentary comes from Stuart Pyke, Mark Webster, and Dan Dawson

programme.title: English Football League Highlights

programme.title: Giant Lobster Hunters
programme.desc: The William Norling is seven days into a nine-day run and Skipper Danny is no closer to finding a buyer for his 1,000kg of lobster. He's running up huge operating costs and desperately needs a sale to stay afloat.

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Robin is bewitched by evil sorceress Lilith, who sends him on a mission to steal the magical silver arrow from Herne's cave. Michael Praed stars

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: Part two of two. Thomas is shocked by the arrival of Diane's twin sister, while a hitch in Higgins' wedding plans is ironed out by a disappointed Agatha. Sharon Stone guest stars

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: A look at a married couple that have made a booming business out of their hand-made Scotch eggs, and how a cotton mill-turned-soap factory is producing traditional bars, according to a process passed down through the generations. Plus, the team of craftsmen making the most accurate compasses in the world, and a behind-the-scenes look at the family firm making teddy bears that are cherished by children around the world

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: The crusading heroes investigate a murder, which leads them to uncover ageing Nazis who are being held in a disused mine. Starring William Gaunt and Alexandra Bastedo

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Robin and the outlaws leave Sherwood to defend a distant village from a band of phantom horsemen known as the Hounds of Lucifer, who terrorise the countryside on the orders of a powerful coven ruled by Morgwyn of Ravenscar. Guest starring Rula Lenska

programme.title: Magnum, PI
programme.desc: Thomas reluctantly agrees to help Higgins' friend Garwood Huddle, a retired bank robber who topped the police's most-wanted list back in the 1940s, find the crooks responsible for kidnapping his grandchild. Tom Selleck stars

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: A £30,000 consignment of mercury is stolen and the squad is bemused when the prime suspect comes up with a cast-iron alibi - he was in the company of his 'mistress' hours before his planned wedding ceremony. Diana Dors guest stars in the crime drama, alongside John Thaw and Dennis Waterman

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: When Ray's van breaks down, Arthur takes to the water using a barge to transport a cargo of dodgy video recorders. However, the fearsome Bible-quoting Welshman who owns them is on his tail. George Cole and Gary Webster star

programme.title: Made in Britain
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at the Scottish firm making cashmere for the world's finest fashion houses. Plus, a look at how a jigsaw puzzle is made, the family of fishermen producing Welsh delicacies of cockles and laver bread, and how a quintessentially British teapot is made

programme.title: World Series of Darts
programme.desc: A chance to see day one of the tournament from Globox Arena in Hamilton, New Zealand, featuring the first-round matches, which saw the eight seeded players take on eight of the best players from Australia and New Zealand for a place in the quarter-finals. Gerwyn Price is the defending champion, but was likely to face stiff competition from the on-form Michael Van Gerwen. Commentary comes from Stuart Pyke, Mark Webster, and Dan Dawson

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Arthur comes up with a plan to boost business at the Winchester Club by staging variety nights. The idea proves popular until the karaoke machine, rented from the fearsome Gabadini family, is stolen. George Cole stars

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: A frustrated housewife supplies Regan with the names of the gang who recently ransacked a bookmakers - including that of her husband, a notorious robber. programme.title: The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: Dave's first plane journey fails to go to plan when the air pressure and the need to go to the toilet makes his head swell

programme.title: The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: The misadventures of underdog Dave Spud and his family. The Spuds have been watching strongman competitions on the telly lately and want to become super-strong - the only problem is that none of them are fit. Investing in GritBits to get them moving, the Spuds discover that the devices are faulty and cannot be switched off, so the Spuds now find themselves unable to stop exercising...

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd is cross when Berry brings his parents fruit fresh from the fridge - if anyone's going to raid the fridge, it should be him! Lloyd and Abacus therefore head to the fridge with Berry as their guide, but they find themselves unprepared for the cold...

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd tries to convince everyone that he's not afraid when they visit a spooky new attraction in the Backov Zofar. Nothing scares him - not even the 'ghost insects' who swoop out of the darkness - but when Abacus goes missing, Lloyd has to face his fears.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean's electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam doesn't dare confess her futile passion for Booboocat - the cutest cat on the internet - but when she hears that he'll be passing through town, she decides to use the Spectral Sceptre to secretly get her idol into her home. Sam is so obsessed with Booboocat that she forgets about Roger...

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Brick decides to launch the quest for the golden sock! It's a treasure hunt in the forest. The hunt is mapped out through riddles based on school lessons from that year. The first one to find the sock gets to choose where the next field trip will be! Since he hasn't studied, Mo decides to ask for the power to know everything the Internet knows. But with the half power, the scepter materialises the Internet under the form of a little boy and a little girl...

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang arrange a mass sleepover to deal with a poltergeist that is attacking Mayor Jones

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Monsters and ghouls get in the way of the Scooby gang's adventures as they travel and spend time together in the summer

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: The Mystery Inc. team is back and just as courageous, adventurous, humorous, and obsessed with cases as ever. Scooby and our gang of mystery-solving teens have been invited by famous comedian Jeff Foxworthy to help him move into an old mansion that he's just purchased, but when they find out that the mansion is haunted by the ghost of an old witch, this Southern-fried mystery takes a dramatic turn. Can our gang help Jeff save this mansion from destruction?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Titans are shocked to learn that the T Tower had previous owners

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: While looking for Hawaii, Bugs Bunny accidentally finds himself in Ireland, where he encounters a magical angry leprechaun. / Marvin the Martian plants his flag on a new planet and claims it 'in the name of Mars,' but each time he does, something new and unexpected happens. / Porky is given a tour of the computerized house of the future, that misunderstands his commands and gives him a crazy time

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. When Issa's grandpa tells him that three guys instantly became the coolest people on the planet by going to the Moon in 1969, the three friends love the idea and decide to do the same! It's not easy, though, and they realise quite quickly that they don't know a lot about rocket science, but even if they can't really go to the Moon, nothing's stopping them from making a video that says that they did...

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. A talent show is being organised in the neighbourhood, and one of the members of the jury is none other than the idol of our three heroes - it's the rapper MC Posey! It's a golden opportunity to get a selfie with the star, and they'll have bragging rights for ages - the friends therefore decide to participate in the event, even if their musical talents are less than extraordinary...

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago
programme.desc: Four ninja warriors battle dark Lord Garmadon and his skeleton army

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Animation following the kindly but accident-prone Mr Magoo. Fizz's latest invention is derailed and Weasel suddenly becomes very intelligent - he decides to improve Fizz's plans, but the two aren't on the same wavelength... and there's only room for one genius on this planet!

programme.title: Mr Magoo
programme.desc: Animation following the kindly but accident-prone Mr Magoo. Weasel sneezes and Fizz, who is a complete hypochondriac, is convinced that his assistant is sick. Terrified of catching his cold, Fizz desperately tries to escape Weasel, but Mr Magoo shows up intent on pampering his sick neighbour.

programme.title: Cheers

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Moe achieves massive success when he turns the tavern into a gay bar, but keeps his heterosexuality a secret to remain in his new clientele's favour. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge notices grey hairs creeping through her blue dye and decides to embrace the shade like other middle-aged women. Homer becomes Moe's official 'wing man' in a bid to boost his friend's ailing love life

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa notices how a patch of wild flowers has a calming effect on two aggressive scorpions, and discovers it has a similar impact on Springfield's human population. A pharmaceutical company soon gets involved, leaving Bart to spot a potential money-making scheme

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer discovers a talent for styling hair and opens a salon that becomes very popular, but begins to feel his gift is a curse as he must listen to people's problems and gossip. programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first destination is North Kingsfield Holiday Cottages in East Yorkshire, where a revelation over evening drinks leaves the guests all at sea

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the week is to Crackin' View Guest House in Northumberland. Owners Steve and Maria Turnbull reckon their scenic vista and homespun appeal will pip their rivals to the post

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rivals arrive at the Domo Boutique Hotel in Oldbury near Birmingham, where owner Ali expects his luxury lodgings to wow his fellow competitors. Helen and Lauren are dazzled by the decor, but a caffeine conundrum leads to some trouble brewing

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guest house owners convene at the Crown Inn in Gayton, Norfolk, where owners Lisa and Neil Staples hope their historic setting and boutique-style rooms will garner praise. On a buggy ride across a wildlife reserve, the rivalry spills over into some raucous racing - but at drinks, it's Neil's chat-up lines that veer off track

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The hosts meet one last time to settle scores and discover what they've been paid. First up is Helen Milner, and her daughter Lauren, but although they asked one pair to close off their curtain comments, it's a surprising set of payments which leave them open-mouthed. Another host addresses why his guests weren't full of beans - only for one pair to express some strong opinions about his breakfast. Off-colour feedback about one B&B's bedding leads to more frank exchanges. The guests' dramatic discoveries surface, before the payments are revealed and the winner is finally announced

programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary exploring Queen Elizabeth II's early life, told through a selection of rare and never-before-seen photographs, video archive and expert testimony. The first episode begins with Princess Elizabeth's birth in 1926 and eventful upbringing, through to her formative years serving in the Auxiliary Territorial Service

programme.title: The Queens that Changed the World
programme.desc: The reigns of influential queens throughout history, beginning with Elizabeth I, who created peace and prosperity in a nation divided by religious turmoil and sowed the seeds for the rise of the British Empire through the travels of global explorers like Francis Drake and Walter Raleigh. The programme also examines the many threats she had to face, including the plots of her cousin, Mary Queen of Scots, and the possibility of a Spanish invasion

programme.title: Matt Baker's Travels in the Country: USA
programme.desc: Matt travels across the Atlantic to experience rural USA. Starting in Florida, he visits a cattle farmer with a passion for keeping traditions alive by hand cutting sugar cane to boil into syrup, using vintage machinery and discovering the tradition of cowboy poetry. He then travels to the Florida Keys at the southern tip of the state and heads out to help with the largest coral reef restoration effort in the world before exploring the everglades

programme.title: Becoming Elizabeth

Sci-fi thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Eiza Gonzalez and Guy Pearce

Deforestation and poaching have halved the apes' population in the last 60 years, and they're in serious danger of becoming extinct. In the company of indigenous guides and naturalists, he gets a better understanding of how they are surviving against worsening odds caused by the increasing threat of human activity and climate change.

programme.desc: The Mayflower transported the first English Puritans from Plymouth to the New World in 1620. The Pilgrims and the ship's crew overcame almost impossible odds to establish a colony, which ultimately gave birth to the United States of America. Taking to the waters off the New England coast, Rob Bell recounts the dramatic story of the Mayflower's 66-day crossing, as she endured high seas and monstrous storms. In Mystic,Connecticut, Rob explores a full-sized replica of the Mayflower and in Plymouth, Massachusetts, unfolds the story of the ship's arrival in the New World

programme.desc: The programme meets a man who runs the Costa del Sol's longest established British fish and chip shop as he uses his day off to set up a stall at a local Sunday market. There is also a visit to rescue centre Donkey Dreamland to meet the dedicated staff and find out the surprising ways in which donkey dung can be used as currency

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Singer, dancer and entertainer Alex tries to introduce her rescue cocker spaniel Elliott to the world of diets and exercise, while Andrea and Paul host a fundraiser at their nightclub for a young girl who needs special medical attention

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Chris and Gary have decided to change everything for a new life in Spain, arriving with just two suitcases, a hotel for a few nights and £3,500. But having never been to Benidorm before, could their dream turn into a nightmare? Scotsman Graham has hit upon the idea of selling organised pub crawls, while another Graham - the drivetime DJ at Fresh Radio - faces a dilemma when he is offered his old job back, which would mean spending less time with girlfriend Jackie

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: Highlights of the singer's American travels. In Los Angeles, Jane boards a 3,000 berth cruise ship bound for San Francisco, meeting former Dallas star Linda Gray, attending a wedding and having an all-over massage that involves her body being coated with chocolate

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world

programme.title: When Cruises Go Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Documentary taking a look at terrifying travel disasters from recent history, from horrifying dramas at sea to one of the worst air disasters in British aviation history, using eye witness testimony and footage taken by those involved telling the human stories behind the events. A cruise ship sailing off the coast of Norway is caught in a dangerous storm, and a passenger witnesses the casing of an airplane engine being ripped off mid-flight

programme.title: Secrets of the Royal Dressmakers: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The designers who create outfits for royal occasions, including wedding dresses. Featuring a look at some of the most memorable dresses and interviews with their creators. Plus, a look at outfits that were designed for Princess Diana but never worn and the reason the Queen always stands out in a crowd

programme.title: Buckingham Palace with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: The actor reveals how tragedy struck in 1788 when George III's health took a devastating turn for the worse, and his behaviour spiralled out of control and made life at the royal residence intolerable. Raksha Dave investigates how the royal residents kept themselves from stinking by taking a bath fully clothed, while JJ Chalmers investigates how tough life was for the hidden army of 200 servants toiling below stairs. Raksha also investigates the filth and squalor that greeted Queen Victoria when she inherited the place, while JJ discovers how the kitchens coped with hosting her lavish wedding breakfast

programme.title: Andrew: The Rise and Fall of the Playboy Prince
programme.desc: The Duke of York's descent into disgrace, featuring interviews with palace insiders, journalists, members of his social circle, and the legal teams that ultimately brought his actions to light. The documentary takes a deep dive into the world of privilege, jealousy, desire and greed that pushed the prince first into the orbit of notorious sex offenders Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, and then into a sordid sex-trafficking scandal that threatened to bring down the House of Windsor

programme.title: Sex & Power: Tabloids
programme.desc: Three-part series delving into the world of tabloid journalism, exploring the lengths the tabloids go to for a story, and the lives they have impacted in the process, featuring rarely seen archive footage and the voices of editors, journalists and celebrity contributors. The first edition focuses on the intertwined narratives of tabloid newspapers and celebrity culture, examining the tabloid's treatment of famous faces such as Ulrika Jonsson, Kerry Katona and Daniella Westbrook

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Great British Ships
programme.desc: Rob Bell boards the ship that kick started the age of polar exploration as he looks at the history of RRS Discovery, the world's first purpose-built scientific vessel. Heading to the Victorian shipbuilding capital of Dundee, Rob finds out why this was the only place in Britain that could make a ship capable of taking on the formidable ice floes of Antarctica, and tells the story of how a chance meeting in London would define the course of polar exploration

programme.title: Michael Palin in North Korea
programme.desc: Michael leaves Pyongyang and is put under the protection of armed guards as he is shown the Joint Security Area on the border with South Korea, where he has a tense exchange with a lieutenant from the Korean People's Army about the Korean War and the DPRK's nuclear weapons programme. He also travels to the east coast of the country and the seaside town of Wonsan, where he sees a massive tourist resort being constructed on the beach, although the nearby new international airport for an expected influx of passengers remains eerily empty

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals
programme.desc: Dan Jones examines Britain's most iconic canals, beginning with the 152-mile Grand Union Canal, which runs up the spine of the country. Constructed at the height of the Industrial Revolution, the task challenged even the greatest engineering minds of the time, including pioneers such as James Brindley, the man behind Britain's first commercial canal, and William Jessop, the person with whom responsibility lay for the building of the main link from Birmingham to London. Travelling along its route, Dan experiences first-hand the innovations behind its construction, including the Blisworth tunnel

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: The engine visits Australia and decides to become an outback tour guide, with disastrous consequences

programme.title: Paw Patrol

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Granny Pig shows Peppa and George her poultry, and something makes a meal of Grandpa Pig's lettuces

programme.desc: Madame Gazelle tries to teach each of the youngsters in Peppa's playgroup a special skill

programme.title: Pip and Posy

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle gets a cold, so Holly and the gang collect the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better

programme.title: Shane the Chef
programme.desc: Shane wants to make apple fool for his special of the day, but when goat Millie eats all the apples he has to find a replacement ingredient

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: A made-up traffic report creates a real traffic problem, so when an emergency call comes, the Fire Team and Police Horse Kilo must go cross-country

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Ryan is eager to please when Daisy asks him to help with some of her duties. Her laziness backfires when Ryan assumes even more of her responsibilities and causes confusion

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When the aliens' spaceship suddenly starts firing anti-gravity rays at random, the pups must repair it and get everyone back to earth

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Posy gets a bit greedy when Pip shares his stickers with her

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit loses his voice while telling the children a story about space rockets, and it is left to Doctor Brown Bear to get him talking again

programme.title: Chip and Potato
programme.desc: The Pugs and Fants compete to find the biggest pumpkin

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The bear is given a metal detector by Mr Gruber and when it beeps he thinks he has found something, and wonders if it is the lost pirate treasure or just another rusty bottle cap

programme.desc: Frizzy sets sail around Boomerang Island in an effort to break Big Trev's record

programme.title: Reu & Harper's Wonder World
